item.title: 马斯克即将上任，贝森特面临财政部首次债务考验
item.description: 彭博社记者将在美国东部时间上午 8 点/格林尼治标准时间下午 1 点的现场问答中回答有关特朗普的欧盟关税威胁及其可能对市场产生的影响的问题。在此收听。【原文：Bloomberg reporters answer questions about Trump's EU tariff threats and the impact it could have on markets in a Live Q&A at 8 a.m. EST/1 p.m. GMT. Listen here.】

item.title: 默克停产加卫苗显示大片疫苗在中国的窘境
item.description: 默克公司（Merck & Co.去年，加卫苗在中国的需求曾一度飙升，但很快就萎缩了，以至于这家美国制药巨头在本周早些时候呼吁停止发货。【原文：Merck & Co.’s blockbuster vaccine Gardasil has had a roller-coaster ride in China. A post-Covid surge in demand for the cancer-preventing shot quickly deflated last year, to the point the US pharmaceutical giant made the call earlier this week to halt shipments.】

item.title: 瑞士监管机构 Finma 反对瑞银关于竞争力的诉求
item.description: 瑞士金融监管机构首席执行官表示，他正在顶住压力，将瑞银集团与全球同行的竞争力作为其监管方法中的一个明确因素。【原文：The chief executive of Switzerland’s financial regulator signaled that he’s resisting pressure to accept the competitiveness of UBS Group AG against its global peers as an explicit factor in its approach to supervision.】

item.title: 降息在即，挪威房价创2022年以来最大涨幅
item.description: 随着抵押贷款规定的放宽和央行降息预期的启动，挪威调整后的住房价格以三年来最快的速度增长。【原文：Norway’s adjusted home prices grew at the fastest pace in three years as a loosening of mortgage rules and an expected start to the central bank’s interest-rate cuts spurred demand.】

item.title: 南非商业情绪跌至 2021 年骚乱以来最低水平
item.description: 2021 年 7 月，南非发生了致命的骚乱、抢劫和纵火事件，供应链中断，产出减少。【原文：An index measuring South African business conditions slumped to the lowest level since July 2021, when deadly riots, looting and arson disrupted supply chains and curtailed output.】

item.title: Natixis 称法国 2024 年赤字可能低于预期
item.description: Natixis 经济学家表示，法国的财政困难可能没有预测的那么严重，因为数据显示去年国家中央财政赤字有所减少。【原文：France’s fiscal difficulties may not be as acute as forecast, Natixis economists said after data showed a smaller central state deficit last year.】

item.title: 相信外星人断送了这位互联网先驱的事业。现在他正面临牢狱之灾
item.description: 约瑟夫-费尔马吉（Joseph Firmage）帮助创造了今天的数字经济。如今，他正被反重力机器投资者起诉，并声称受到牙买加电信诈骗团伙的追捕，还有一个人假装是史蒂文-姆努钦（Steven Mnuchin）。【原文：Joseph Firmage helped create today’s digital economy. These days, he’s being sued by antigravity-machine investors and claiming to be hounded by a Jamaican wire-fraud gang, with a guy pretending to be Steven Mnuchin along for the ride.】

item.title: 糖果粉碎机引发非洲游戏热潮，收入突破 18 亿美元
item.description: 研究显示，受手机娱乐需求的刺激，去年非洲游戏产业的增长速度几乎是全球平均水平的六倍。【原文：Africa’s gaming industry grew almost six times faster than the global average last year, spurred by demand for entertainment on mobile phones, research showed.】

item.title: 竞相涌向边境制造商在特朗普即将到来的关税下争分夺秒
item.description: 在疯狂的 72 小时内，唐纳德-特朗普总统威胁要对加拿大、墨西哥和中国征收惩罚性的新关税，导致股市和货币暴跌，并给世界贸易带来了冲击波。【原文：Over a frantic 72 hours, President Donald Trump’s threat of punishing new tariffs on Canada, Mexico and China sent stocks and currencies tumbling and shock waves through world trade.】

item.title: 卡尼提议取消加拿大资本利得税增税政策
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）计划宣布，如果他在自由党领袖竞选中获胜并成为总理，他将不会落实提高加拿大资本利得税的提议。【原文：Mark Carney plans to announce he won’t follow through with a proposed increase to Canada’s capital gains tax if he wins the Liberal Party leadership race and becomes prime minister, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据说 JD.com 重新燃起收购德国 Ceconomy 的兴趣
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国电子商务公司 JD.com Inc. 再次表达了收购德国电子产品零售商 Ceconomy AG 的兴趣。【原文：Chinese e-commerce firm JD.com Inc. has renewed its interest in acquiring German electronics retailer Ceconomy AG, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: EFishery 支持者将权衡清算或收购等方案
item.description: 据彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）查阅的一份文件显示，鉴于印尼农业科技公司eFishery涉嫌会计欺诈，一名负责调查该公司涉嫌会计欺诈案的顾问建议投资者尽快在本月内决定是清算还是重组这家备受瞩目的初创公司。【原文：An adviser probing the alleged accounting fraud at Indonesian agritech company eFishery recommended that investors make a decision on whether to liquidate or restructure the company as soon as this month, in light of the rapid unraveling of the high-profile startup, according to a document reviewed by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: OpenAI 首席执行官在向印度创始人推介时称用户数量增加了两倍
item.description: OpenAI的萨姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）称印度是这家初创公司最重要的国际市场，因为去年印度的用户数量增长了两倍。【原文：OpenAI’s Sam Altman called India the startup’s most important international market after a tripling in users last year, closing a days-long tour of Asia that’s taken him from Tokyo to Delhi.】

item.title: 美国接管空无一人的加沙？为什么特朗普的提议令人震惊？
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）说得合情合理，直截了当。特朗普在 2 月 4 日表示，美国作为地球上最强大的国家，将在一年半的破坏性战争后接管加沙地带，拆除其受损建筑和未爆弹药，并重建该地。他说，与此同时，邻国应接纳加沙人，让他们过上 "美好 "的生活，让他们不想再回去。【原文：President Donald Trump made it sound logical and straightforward. The US, the most powerful country on Earth, would take over the Gaza Strip after a year and a half of devastating war, remove its damaged buildings and unexploded ordnance, and rebuild the place, Trump said on Feb. 4. Meanwhile, he said, Gazans should be taken in by neighboring countries and given access to lives so “beautiful” they wouldn’t want to return.】

item.title: 芬坎蒂耶里获得挪威邮轮 90 亿欧元巨额订单
item.description: 意大利造船商芬坎蒂耶里（Fincantieri）锁定了其有史以来最大的邮轮订单，同意以约90亿欧元（94亿美元）的价格为挪威邮轮控股有限公司（Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings Ltd.）建造四艘新船。【原文：Italian shipmaker Fincantieri locked up its largest ever order for cruise liners, agreeing to build four new vessels for Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings Ltd. for about €9 billion ($9.4 billion).】

item.title: 道达尔能源公司首席执行官预计美国将在数周内为莫桑比克液化天然气项目提供资金
item.description: 道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies SE）首席执行官帕特里克-普瓦纳（Patrick Pouyanne）表示，他预计美国进出口银行将在唐纳德-特朗普总统执政的几周内完成对其莫桑比克液化天然气项目 47 亿美元融资的审批。【原文：TotalEnergies SE Chief Executive Officer Patrick Pouyanne said he expects the US Export-Import bank to finish approval of $4.7 billion in financing for its Mozambique liquefied natural gas project in a matter of weeks under President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 前摩根大通银行家辛格在印度首席执行官人选出炉前加入 StanChart
item.description: 据知情人士透露，前摩根大通银行高管普拉布德夫-辛格（Prabdev Singh）本周加入了渣打银行，这家总部位于伦敦的银行正在等待印度央行批准任命他为新的国家主管。【原文：Ex-JPMorgan Chase & Co. executive Prabdev Singh joined Standard Chartered Plc this week as the London-based lender awaits approval from India’s central bank to name him as its new country head, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 英国服务企业以一年来最快速度提价
item.description: 2025 年伊始，英国四分之一的服务企业提高了价格，因为工资支出不断增加，而且工党提高工资税的 260 亿英镑也即将带来冲击。【原文：One in four of Britain’s services firms put up prices at the start of 2025 amid rising wage bills and the imminent hit from Labour’s £26 billion hike in payroll taxes.】

item.title: 格里维特称法国农业信贷银行正在捍卫其在意大利的利益
item.description: 在其意大利合作伙伴 Banco BPM SpA 成为主动收购目标之后，法国农业信贷银行（Credit Agricole SA）的一位高层管理人员表示，该行的目标是捍卫其在意大利的业务利益。【原文：Credit Agricole SA aims to defend its business interests in Italy, a top executive said, after its Italian partner Banco BPM SpA became the target of an unsolicited takeover approach.】

item.title: 德国汽车业信心指数因竞争力担忧创下新低
item.description: 德国汽车业的景气度在 1 月份创下新低，企业对自身的竞争能力忧心忡忡，这凸显了从宝马汽车公司到大众汽车公司的汽车制造商以及包括大陆汽车公司在内的供应商所面临的挑战。【原文：Sentiment in Germany’s automotive industry reached a new low in January, as companies fret about their ability to compete, highlighting the challenges facing carmakers from BMW AG to Volkswagen AG and suppliers including Continental AG.】

item.title: 欧洲央行工资跟踪调查显示今年经济增速将大幅放缓
item.description: 欧洲中央银行对欧元区未来薪资增长的主要衡量指标继续显示，2025 年欧元区薪资增长将大幅放缓，这为通胀进一步回落带来了希望，而通胀回落将允许更多的降息。【原文：The European Central Bank’s main gauge of future euro-zone pay growth continued to signal a sharp slowdown in 2025, underpinning hopes for a further retreat in inflation that should allow more interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克现在可以使用的国库支付系统
item.description:
什么是财政局？【原文：

What is the Bureau of the Fiscal Service?

】

item.title: 奇货可居：马斯克现在可以访问的美国支付系统（播客）
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）和他的 "政府效率部"（DOGE）已经进入了财政部内一个名为 "财政服务局"（Bureau of Fiscal Service）的部门。但这个部门究竟是做什么的？它在政府运作以及潜在的金融市场中发挥着怎样的关键作用？在本期节目中，我们将采访《危机笔记》（Notes On The Crises）时事通讯的作者内森-坦克斯（Nathan Tankus）。他解释了该办公室的技术层面以及与扣押有关的法律问题。【原文：Elon Musk and his Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE) have gained access to a unit within the Treasury Department called the Bureau of Fiscal Service. But what does this unit actually do? How critical of a role does it play in the operations of government, and potentially, financial markets? On this episode, we speak with Nathan Tankus, the author of the Notes On The Crises newsletter. He explains both the technical aspect of this office, as well as the legal questions surrounding impound】

item.title: 韩国核电站运营商因担心安全而禁止人工智能服务
item.description: 出于安全考虑，韩国国营核反应堆运营商韩国水电与核电公司（Korea Hydro & Nuclear Power Co.【原文：Korea Hydro & Nuclear Power Co., South Korea’s state-run operator of nuclear reactors, has blocked the use of all artificial intelligence services, including DeepSeek and ChatGPT, from its systems due to security concerns.】

item.title: 北欧半导体因芯片需求预测乐观而大涨
item.description: 北欧半导体公司（Nordic Semiconductor ASA）股价上涨，此前这家挪威芯片制造商表示，它看到了所有终端市场的 "逐步复苏"，并给出了超出预期的第一季度收入指导。【原文：Nordic Semiconductor ASA shares rose after the Norwegian chipmaker said it sees a “gradual recovery” in all end markets and gave first-quarter revenue guidance that exceeded expectations.】

item.title: 冰岛央行再次大幅降息
item.description: 冰岛央行连续第二次大幅下调借贷成本，理由是随着通胀持续消退，大西洋经济趋冷。【原文：Iceland’s central bank delivered a second straight jumbo cut in borrowing costs, citing a cooldown in the Atlantic economy as inflation continues to subside.】

item.title: 中国正考虑调查苹果应用商店的收费和做法
item.description: 中国反垄断监督机构正在为可能对苹果公司的政策及其向应用程序开发者收取的费用进行调查奠定基础，这是中国政府更广泛推动的一部分，有可能成为中国与美国贸易战的另一个热点。【原文：China’s antitrust watchdog is laying the groundwork for a potential probe into Apple Inc.’s policies and the fees it charges app developers, part of a broader push by Beijing that risks becoming another flashpoint in the country’s trade war with the US.】

item.title: 塔塔电力寻求水电项目以扩大清洁能源投资
item.description: 塔塔电力公司正在印度和海外寻找水力发电的机会，因为该公司希望在未来 14 个月内将可再生能源在其整体投资组合中所占的比例提高到一半以上。【原文：Tata Power Co. is scouting for hydroelectric power opportunities in India and overseas as it looks to ramp up the share of renewable energy in its overall portfolio to more than half in the next 14 months.】

item.title: 美国加征关税后泰国工业界准备应对中国商品的大量涌入
item.description: 在特朗普政府对中国进口商品征收关税后，泰国企业希望政府加大力度保护本地生产商免受可能涌入的廉价商品的冲击。【原文：Thai companies want the government to step up efforts to shield local producers from a potential influx of cheap goods following the Trump administration’s move to slap tariffs on Chinese imports.】

item.title: 据说 CATL 将在未来几周内申请在香港上市
item.description: 当代 Amperex Technology Co.据熟悉内情的人士透露，安培瑞斯科技有限公司正在考虑最快于本月或三月初提交在香港上市的申请。【原文：Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd. is considering filing its application for its jumbo Hong Kong listing as soon as this month or early March, people familiar with the matter said.】
